remarks: Binary relation expressing ` B ` covers ` A ` .  Definition of covers in [Kalmbach] p. 15.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cvbr2 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A <oH B <-> ( A C. B /\ A. x e. CH ( ( A C. x /\ x C_ B ) -> x = B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
